activities: Yozio is a business to business software company that helps its customers market their products and services.  Yozio collects information from visitors to its site for Yozio's use, and may be exposed to certain device data  (but not personal data) about its customers' customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: information provided by individuals at the Yozio website
